author: AP
title: FIFA extends men's age limit for Tokyo Olympics due to virus
description: FIFA has extended the age limit for the men’s soccer tournament at the rescheduled Tokyo Olympics due to the coronavirus pandemic
content:
GENEVA (AP) — FIFA has extended the age limit for the men’s soccer tournament at the rescheduled Tokyo Olympics due to the coronavirus pandemic.
The amended Olympic rule on Friday retains the “players born on or after Jan. 1, 1997” standard for the Tokyo Gam… [+2169 chars]
